v1.19.0.description: refactored to extend from hero-item-base (new script dependency)

v1.18.description: fixes issue with pointer cursor showing when hero-item not sloppy clickable

v1.17.2.description: fixes issue with touch events being double-counted
fixes issue with middle-mouse click and right-mouse click being treated like a left-mouse click

v1.17.0.description: fixes clicking in non call-to-action area of hero item and adds pub/sub support for hero-item clicked notification
fixes various issues with touch and tapping/clicking not working in non-MSFT browsers

v1.15.0.description: updates vp3/vp4 hero content block layouts to narrow them so they don't overlap so much of the image

v1.12.0.description: updates vertical spacing to match other modules when hero follows other modules

v1.11.0.description: adds option for use with transparent header

v1.10.0.description: updates hero typography sizes in viewports 5 and 6

v1.9.0.description: changes content container width in centered layouts to allow for longer text strings before line breaks

v1.8.0.description: updates default functionality to include making the entire hero item clickable
changes module to allow images to maintain a fixed aspect ratio instead of cropping
updates default behavior to include opacity over the image when the hero item is hovered
removes default background color; IE8 does not recognize the overriding gradient
